title: Can RIot refund my Champ after I got Skin Permanent from Chest on that Champ?
body: I DONT CARE ABOUT THE SKIN, I just want the Champion to be refunded because I made a mistake. Can I get my IP back? No need to refund the skin from hextech, idgaf about that

replies.body: With the way our current refund system is set up, it won't let you refund a champion if you own any skins for them. Since you do still have some refund tokens left, reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to get that taken care of for you!
